headline: Petrox Announces New Directors
summary: Calgary, Alberta--(Newsfile Corp. - December 17, 2025) - Petrox Resources Corp. (TSXV: PTC) (the "Corporation" or "Petrox") is pleased to announce the addition of Garth Braun and Bradley Parkes to the Corporation's Board of Directors. Mr. Braun was elected at the Corporation's annual general and shareholders' meeting held on December 15, 2025. Mr. Parkes was appointed to the Corporation's board by resolution of the directors on December 16, 2025.Garth Braun is a seasoned business executive...

headline: NACD New England Honors PTC, Shawmut Design and Construction as 2026’s Public and Private "Boards of the Year"
summary: BOSTON, December 17, 2025--NACD New England names boards of PTC Inc. and Shawmut Design and Construction as "Boards of the Year" and honors Ellen Zane for Lifetime Achievement.
